Model updating
https://bmcmedresmethodol.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12874-016-0231-2

```{r}
test_data_file = 'drc-data.csv' 
test_data <- read.table(test_data_file, sep=",", header=TRUE, na.strings="\\N")

test_data %>% 
  rename(
    Death = S7.FinalStatus,
    PatientAge = AD.Age,
    CT = Lab.CtNP.D1,
    AnyBleeding = S2.Bleeding,
    Diarrhoea = S2.Diarrhea,
    Breathlessness = S2.DifficultyBreathing, 
    SwallowingProblems = S2.DifficultySwallowing,
    Anorexia = S2.AppetiteLoss,
    BoneMusclePain = S2.JoinMusclePain
    ) -> model_data

model_data %>%
 select(Death, PatientAge, CT, AnyBleeding, Diarrhoea, Breathlessness, SwallowingProblems, Anorexia, BoneMusclePain) -> model_data

model_data %>% drop_na() -> model_data


```

```{r}
load("model-age-ct-symp/model.RData")

pred0 <- predict(model, model_data)
pred0
```
